mapper.select:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listSystId */
select /*+ ccd_comcode_l02$S01_사용자명_시스템ID 조회 */ A.COMN_DTLS_CD as COMN_DTLS_CD /* 공통상세코드 */ , A.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM /* 상세코드명 */ , B.COMN_ITEM_CD as COMN_ITEM_CD /* 공통항목코드 */ , B.COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL as COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL /* 공통항목문자값 */ from CCCMCDDMT A /* 코드상세 */ , CCCMCDIDT B /* 코드항목값 */ where A.COMN_GRP_CD in ('CCC_005','CCC_006','CCC_007') and A.COMN_GRP_CD = B.COMN_GRP_CD and A.COMN_DTLS_CD = B.COMN_DTLS_CD and ( ((#{srchCndtCtn} = '1') and (A.APFN_YMD > sysdate)) or ((#{srchCndtCtn}='2') and ((A.COMN_DTLS_CD like #{detlCdNm} || '%') or (A.DETL_CD_NM like #{detlCdNm} || '%'))) or ((#{srchCndtCtn} = '3') and (A.COMN_DTLS_CD = #{detlCdNm})) or ((#{srchCndtCtn} = '4') and (A.COMN_DTLS_CD like #{detlCdNm} || '%')) ) order by A.COMN_DTLS_CD

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComcode2 */
select /*+ ccd_comcode_l13$S01_사용자명_코드항목 조회 */ A.COMN_DTLS_CD as COMN_DTLS_CD, /* 공통세부코드 */ A.COMN_ITEM_CD as COMN_ITEM_CD, /* 공통항목코드 */ B.COMN_ITEM_NM as COMN_ITEM_NM, /* 공통항목명 */ A.COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL as COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL /* 공통항목문자값 */ from CCCMCDIDT A, /* 코드항목값 */ CCCMCDIMT B /* 코드항목 */ where A.COMN_GRP_CD = B.COMN_GRP_CD and A.COMN_ITEM_CD = B.COMN_ITEM_CD and A.COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} and ( ((#{afiSrchCndtCtn} = '1') and ((B.APST_YMD <= sysdate) and (B.APFN_YMD >= sysdate))) or ((#{afiSrchCndtCtn} = '2') and (A.COMN_DTLS_CD = #{comnDtlsCd})) or ((#{afiSrchCndtCtn} = '3') and (A.COMN_DTLS_CD = nvl(#{comnDtlsCd}, A.COMN_DTLS_CD))) )

select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComcode6 */ A.COMN_DTLS_CD as COMN_DTLS_CD /* 공통세부코드 */ , nvl(B.DETL_CD_NM, A.DETL_CD_NM) as DETL_CD_NM /* 상세코드명 */ , a.DETL_CD_DSCR_CTN as DETL_CD_DSCR_CTN , A.COMN_DTLS_CD || ' - ' || nvl(B.DETL_CD_NM, A.DETL_CD_NM) as RTUR_VL from CCCMCDDMT A /* 코드상세 */ , CCCMCDDLT B /* 언어별상세코드명 */ where A.COMN_GRP_CD = B.COMN_GRP_CD(+) and A.COMN_DTLS_CD = B.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) and ( ((#{srchCndtCtn} = '1') and ((A.APST_YMD <= sysdate) and (A.APFN_YMD >= sysdate))) or ((#{srchCndtCtn} = '2') and (A.COMN_DTLS_CD like #{comnDtlsCd} || '%')) ) and B.LNGG_CD(+) = #{lnggCd} and A.COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} order by A.SCRN_DSPL_SQNC, A.COMN_DTLS_CD

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComnCdOptn0001 */ select /*+ ccd_cditemv_l01$S01_공통코드옵션조회 */ comn_dtls_cd as comn_dtls_cd , comn_item_chrc_vl as detl_cd_nm , comn_dtls_cd||'-'||comn_item_chrc_vl as detl_cd_dscr_ctn from CCCDITEMV where 1=1 and COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} and COMN_ITEM_CD = #{comnDtlsCd} and trunc(sysdate) between apst_ymd and apfn_ymd and COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL is not null order by SCRN_DSPL_SQNC

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComnGrpCd */ select /*+ ccd_comcode_l18$S01_공통코드 그룹코드 조회 */ ta.COMN_GRP_CD as COMN_GRP_CD , ta.GRP_CD_NM as GRP_CD_NM , ta.HGRN_GRP_CD as HGRN_GRP_CD , ta.APST_YMD as APST_YMD , ta.APFN_YMD as APFN_YMD , ta.GRP_CD_DSCR_CTN as GRP_CD_DSCR_CTN , ta.ASIG_SYST_ID as ASIG_SYST_ID , ta.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM_1 , ta.CNIX_ASGN_ID as CNIX_ASGN_ID , ta.ACWR_ASGN_ID as ACWR_ASGN_ID , ta.DETL_CD_NM_1 as DETL_CD_NM_2 , ta.LIST_CD_TABL_NM as LIST_CD_TABL_NM , ta.TYPE_CD as TYPE_CD , ta.RPRS_ENSN_TABL_NM as RPRS_ENSN_TABL_NM , ta.RPRS_ENSN_CLMN_NM as RPRS_ENSN_CLMN_NM , ta.SUBCODEYN as SRCH_DVSN_VL , ta.USER_NM as USER_NM , ta.USER_NM_1 as USER_NM_1 , ta.EN as EN , DECODE( ( SELECT USER_NM FROM CCUSERAMT WHERE LGIN_ID = ta.FRST_RGSR_ID AND ROWNUM < 2 ), '', ta.FRST_RGSR_ID, ( ta.FRST_RGSR_ID || ' [ ' || ( SELECT USER_NM FROM CCUSERAMT WHERE LGIN_ID = ta.FRST_RGSR_ID AND ROWNUM < 2 ) || ' ]' )) as USER_NM_2 , ta.FRST_RGST_DT as FRST_RGST_DT , DECODE( ( SELECT USER_NM FROM CCUSERAMT WHERE LGIN_ID = ta.LAST_UPDR_ID AND ROWNUM < 2 ), '', ta.LAST_UPDR_ID, ( ta.LAST_UPDR_ID || ' [ ' || ( SELECT USER_NM FROM CCUSERAMT WHERE LGIN_ID = ta.LAST_UPDR_ID AND ROWNUM < 2 ) || ' ]' )) as USER_NM_3 , ta.LAST_UPDT_DT as LAST_UPDT_DT from ( select A.COMN_GRP_CD /* 공통그룹코드 */ , A.GRP_CD_NM /* 그룹코드명 */ , A.HGRN_GRP_CD /* 상위그룹코드 */ , to_char(A.APST_YMD, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as APST_YMD /* 적용시작일자 */ , to_char(A.APFN_YMD, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as APFN_YMD /* 적용종료일자 */ , A.GRP_CD_DSCR_CTN /* 그룹코드설명내용 */ , A.ASIG_SYST_ID /* 담당시스템ID */ , B.DETL_CD_NM /* 담당시스템명(상세코드) */ , A.CNIX_ASGN_ID /* CI담당자 ID */ , A.ACWR_ASGN_ID /* 현업담당자 ID */ , C.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM_1 /* 코드유형(상세코드1) */ , A.LIST_CD_TABL_NM /* 목록코드테이블명 */ , A.TYPE_CD /* 유형코드 */ , A.RPRS_ENSN_TABL_NM /* 대표영문테이블명 */ , A.RPRS_ENSN_CLMN_NM /* 대표영문컬럼명 */ , case when EXISTS( select e.COMN_GRP_CD from CCCMCDDMT e /* 공통코드값_T */ where e.COMN_GRP_CD = a.COMN_GRP_CD and ( ( trunc( e.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( e.APFN_YMD ) > trunc( sysdate ) ) or ( trunc( e.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( e.APFN_YMD ) >= trunc( to_date( '29991231', 'YYYYMMDD' ) ) ) ) -- 2021.08.13. KHS. 요청번호 GRMRD2107031 -- 그룹코드관리 화면에서 상세코드를 가지고 있는 그룹코드 조회 가능하도록 요청 and e.COMN_DTLS_CD = nvl ( #{comnDtlsCd} , e.COMN_DTLS_CD ) ) then 'Y' else 'N' end as SUBCODEYN /* 상세코드여부 */ , e.USER_NM as USER_NM /* CI담당자명 */ , f.USER_NM as USER_NM_1 /* 현업담당자명 */ , case when EXISTS( select Q.COMN_GRP_CD from CCCMCDIMT Q /* 공통코드추가항목_T */ where Q.COMN_GRP_CD = a.COMN_GRP_CD and ( ( trunc( Q.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( Q.APFN_YMD ) > trunc( sysdate ) ) or ( trunc( Q.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( Q.APFN_YMD ) >= trunc( to_date( '29991231', 'YYYYMMDD' ) ) ) ) ) then 'Y' else 'N' end as EN /* 코드항목여부 */ , a.FRST_RGSR_ID /* 최초등록자ID */ , to_char(a.FRST_RGST_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as FRST_RGST_DT /* 최초등록일시 */ , a.LAST_UPDR_ID as LAST_UPDR_ID /* 최종수정자ID */ , to_char(a.LAST_UPDT_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as LAST_UPDT_DT /* 최종수정일시 */ from CCCMCDMMT a /* 공통코드_T */ , CCCMCDDMT b /* 코드상세 담당시스템ID명_T */ , CCCMCDDMT c /* 코드상세 코드유형_T */ , CCUSRDPHT e /* NEXMED-EHR 사용자 역할정보_T */ , CCUSRDPHT f /* NEXMED-EHR 사용자 역할정보_T */ where A.ASIG_SYST_ID = B.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) and B.COMN_GRP_CD(+) IN ('CCC_005','CCC_006','CCC_007') and A.TYPE_CD = C.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) and C.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'CCC_004' and a.CNIX_ASGN_ID = e.USER_ID(+) and a.ACWR_ASGN_ID = f.USER_ID(+)
-- 코드/ 명 변수값 and ( ( a.COMN_GRP_CD like '%' || #{grpCdNm} || '%' ) or ( upper( a.GRP_CD_NM ) like '%' || upper( #{grpCdNm} ) || '%' ) )
-- 시스템ID 변수값 and A.ASIG_SYST_ID like #{asigSystId} || '%'
-- 삭제코드 조회 여부 -- srchYn : Y : 삭제된 코드도 보기 and ( ( trunc( a.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( a.APFN_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) or ( trunc( a.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( a.APFN_YMD ) > trunc( sysdate ) ) or ( trunc( a.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( a.APFN_YMD ) <> trunc( to_date( '29991231', 'YYYYMMDD' ) ) ) )
-- 삭제코드 조회 여부 -- srchYn : N : 삭제 않된 코드만 보기 and ( ( trunc( a.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( a.APFN_YMD ) > trunc( sysdate ) ) or ( trunc( a.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( a.APFN_YMD ) >= trunc( to_date( '29991231', 'YYYYMMDD' ) ) ) )
-- 삭제코드 조회 여부 -- 화면에서 삭제여부가 빈값이면, 삭제 않된 데이터만 조회되게 처리 한다. and ( ( trunc( a.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( a.APFN_YMD ) > trunc( sysdate ) ) or ( trunc( a.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( a.APFN_YMD ) >= trunc( to_date( '29991231', 'YYYYMMDD' ) ) ) )
) ta where ((#{srchCndtCtn} = 'ALL') or (ta.SUBCODEYN = #{srchCndtCtn})) -- 상세코드 변수값 order by ta.COMN_GRP_CD

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComnGrpCd2 */
select /*+ ccd_comcode_l01$S01_사용자명_공통그룹코드조회 */ A.COMN_GRP_CD as COMN_GRP_CD /* 공통그룹코드 */ , A.GRP_CD_NM as GRP_CD_NM /* 그룹코드명 */ , A.HGRN_GRP_CD as HGRN_GRP_CD /* 상위그룹코드 */ , to_char(A.APST_YMD, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as APST_YMD /* 적용시작일자 */ , to_char(A.APFN_YMD, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') as APFN_YMD /* 적용종료일자 */ , A.GRP_CD_DSCR_CTN as GRP_CD_DSCR_CTN /* 그룹코드설명내용 */ , A.ASIG_SYST_ID as ASIG_SYST_ID /* 담당시스템ID */ , B.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM_1 /* 담당시스템명(상세코드) */ , A.CNIX_ASGN_ID as CNIX_ASGN_ID /* CI담당자 ID */ , A.ACWR_ASGN_ID as ACWR_ASGN_ID /* 현업담당자 ID */ , C.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM_2 /* 코드유형(상세코드1) */ , A.LIST_CD_TABL_NM as LIST_CD_TABL_NM /* 목록코드테이블명 */ , A.TYPE_CD as TYPE_CD from CCCMCDMMT a /* 코드_T */ , CCCMCDDMT b /* 코드상세 담당시스템ID명_T */ , CCCMCDDMT c /* 코드상세 코드유형_T */ where A.ASIG_SYST_ID = B.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) and B.COMN_GRP_CD(+) in ('CCC_005', 'CCC_006', 'CCC_007') and A.TYPE_CD = C.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) and C.COMN_GRP_CD(+) = 'CCC_004' and ( ((#{srchCndtCtn} = '1') and (A.COMN_GRP_CD LIKE '%' || #{grpCdNm} || '%')) or ((#{srchCndtCtn} = '2') and (upper(A.GRP_CD_NM) LIKE '%' || upper(#{grpCdNm}) || '%')) or ((#{srchCndtCtn} = '3') and (A.COMN_GRP_CD = upper(#{grpCdNm}) )) ) and ( (A.ASIG_SYST_ID LIKE '%' || #{asigSystId} || '%') or ((#{asigSystId} IS NULL) and (A.ASIG_SYST_ID IS NULL)) ) and ( (nvl(#{srchYn}, '*') = '*') or ( (#{srchYn} = 'Y') and (trunc(a.APST_YMD) <= trunc(sysdate)) and (trunc(a.APFN_YMD) >= trunc(sysdate)) ) ) order by A.COMN_GRP_CD

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComnGrpCdSmpc */
SELECT /*+ ccd_comcode_l15$S01_그룹코드 조회 */ COMN_GRP_CD as COMN_GRP_CD /* 공통그룹코드 */ , GRP_CD_NM as GRP_CD_NM /* 그룹코드명 */ FROM CCCMCDMMT /* 공통코드_T */ WHERE ( ( COMN_GRP_CD like '%' || #{grpCdNm} || '%' ) or ( GRP_CD_NM like '%' || #{grpCdNm} || '%' ) ) AND trunc(APST_YMD) <= trunc(sysdate) AND trunc(APFN_YMD) > trunc(sysdate) ORDER BY COMN_GRP_CD

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComnCdItem */ select /*+ ccd_comcode_l03$S01_사용자명_공통항목코드조회 */ COMN_ITEM_CD as COMN_ITEM_CD /* 공통항목코드 */ , COMN_ITEM_NM as COMN_ITEM_NM /* 공통항목명 */ , ITEM_DSCR_CTN as ITEM_DSCR_CTN /* 코드항목설명 */ from CCCMCDIMT /* 코드항목_T */ where COMN_GRP_CD =#{comnGrpCd} /* 공통그룹코드 */

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComnGrpCdMltiLngg */ select /*+ ccd_comcode_l04$S01_사용자명_다국어 조회 */ A.COMN_GRP_CD as COMN_GRP_CD /* 공통그룹코드 */ , B.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM /* 언어코드명 */ , A.LNGG_CD as LNGG_CD /* 언어코드 */ , A.GRP_CD_NM as GRP_CD_NM /* 그룹코드명 */ , A.GRP_CD_DSCR_CTN as GRP_CD_DSCR_CTN /* 그룹코드설명내용 */ from CCCMCDMLT A /* 언어별코드명_T */ , CCCMCDDMT B /* 코드상세_T */ where A.LNGG_CD = B.COMN_DTLS_CD /* 공통세부코드 */ and B.COMN_GRP_CD = 'CCC_003' and A.COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} and A.LNGG_CD like #{lnggCd} || '%'

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComnCdItem3 */
SELECT /*+ ccd_comcode_l08$S01_코드항목값 조회 */ A.COMN_GRP_CD as COMN_GRP_CD /* 공통그룹코드 */ , A.COMN_DTLS_CD as COMN_DTLS_CD /* 공통세부코드 */ , A.COMN_ITEM_CD as COMN_ITEM_CD /* 공통항목코드 */ , B.COMN_ITEM_NM as COMN_ITEM_NM /* 공통항목명 */ , A.COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL as COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL /* 공통항목문자값 */ , B.ITEM_DSCR_CTN as ITEM_DSCR_CTN /* 항목설명내용 */ FROM CCCMCDIDT A /* 코드항목값_T */ , CCCMCDIMT B /* 코드항목_T */ WHERE A.COMN_GRP_CD = B.COMN_GRP_CD AND A.COMN_ITEM_CD = B.COMN_ITEM_CD AND A.COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} AND ( /* [ srchCndtCtn : 1 ] 의 사용처 : [ 상세코드관리 : CCC002F1 ]에서 [ 코드항목목록 ] 조회시 사용 */ ( ( #{srchCndtCtn} = '1' ) and ( /* [ 적용시작/ 종료일자 ]를 비교하여 유효한 코드만 조회처리 한다. */ ( trunc( B.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( B.APFN_YMD ) > trunc( sysdate ) ) or ( trunc( B.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( B.APFN_YMD ) >= trunc( to_date('29991231', 'YYYYMMDD') ) ) ) ) or ( ( #{srchCndtCtn} = '2' ) and ( A.COMN_DTLS_CD = #{comnDtlsCd} ) ) )

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComnCdItem2 */
SELECT /*+ ccd_comcode_l09$S01_사용자명_상세코드 코드항목 조회 */ A.COMN_GRP_CD as COMN_GRP_CD /* 공통그룹코드 */ , B.COMN_DTLS_CD as COMN_DTLS_CD /* 공통세부코드 */ , A.COMN_ITEM_CD as COMN_ITEM_CD /* 공통항목코드 */ , A.COMN_ITEM_NM as COMN_ITEM_NM /* 공통항목명 */ , A.COMN_ITEM_TYP_CD as COMN_ITEM_TYP_CD /* 공통항목타입코드 */ , A.APST_YMD as APST_YMD /* 적용시작일자 */ , A.APFN_YMD as APFN_YMD /* 적용종료일자 */ , B.COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL as COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL /* 공통항목문자값 */ , A.ITEM_DSCR_CTN as ITEM_DSCR_CTN /* 항목설명내용 */ FROM CCCMCDIMT A /* 코드항목_T */ , CCCMCDIDT B /* 코드항목값_T */ WHERE A.COMN_GRP_CD = B.COMN_GRP_CD(+) AND A.COMN_ITEM_CD = B.COMN_ITEM_CD(+) AND A.COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} AND B.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) = #{comnDtlsCd} AND ( ( trunc( A.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( A.APFN_YMD ) > trunc( sysdate ) ) or ( trunc( A.APST_YMD ) <= trunc( sysdate ) ) and ( trunc( A.APFN_YMD ) >= trunc( to_date('29991231', 'YYYYMMDD') ) ) )

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComnDetlCdMltiLngg */ select /*+ ccd_comcode_l07$S01_사용자명_언어별상세코드명 조회 */ A.COMN_GRP_CD as COMN_GRP_CD /* 공통그룹코드 */ , A.COMN_DTLS_CD as COMN_DTLS_CD /* 공통세부코드 */ , A.LNGG_CD as LNGG_CD /* 언어코드 */ , B.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM_1 /* 언어코드명 */ , A.DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM /* 상세코드명 */ , A.DETL_CD_DSCR_CTN as DETL_CD_DSCR_CTN /* 상세코드설명내용 */ from CCCMCDDLT A /* 언어별상세코드명 */ , CCCMCDDMT B /* 코드상세 */ where A.LNGG_CD = B.COMN_DTLS_CD /* 공통세부코드 */ and B.COMN_GRP_CD = 'CCC_003' and A.COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} and A.COMN_DTLS_CD = #{comnDtlsCd} and A.LNGG_CD like '%' || #{lnggCd} || '%'

select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComcdDetlInqr */ COMN_GRP_CD as COMN_GRP_CD , COMN_DTLS_CD as COMN_DTLS_CD , DETL_CD_NM as DETL_CD_NM , DETL_CD_DSCR_CTN as DETL_CD_DSCR_CTN , APST_YMD as APST_YMD , APFN_YMD as APFN_YMD , SCRN_DSPL_SQNC as SCRN_DSPL_SQNC from CCCMCDDMT where COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} and APST_YMD <= sysdate and APFN_YMD >= trunc(sysdate) order by SCRN_DSPL_SQNC

select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listGrpCdByNm */ COMN_GRP_CD as COMN_GRP_CD , GRP_CD_NM as GRP_CD_NM , to_char(APST_YMD,'YYYY-MM-DD') as APST_YMD , to_char(APFN_YMD,'YYYY-MM-DD') as APFN_YMD , decode(TYPE_CD,'C','공통코드', 'L','개별코드', '미정의') as RTUR_VL from CCCMCDMMT where ((nvl(#{grpCdNm}, '*') = '*') or (COMN_GRP_CD like '%' || #{grpCdNm} || '%' ) or (GRP_CD_NM like '%' || #{grpCdNm} || '%' ) )

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComcode19 */
select /*+ ccd_comcode_l19$S01_코드상세 조회 */ A.COMN_DTLS_CD /* 공통세부코드 */ , nvl(B.DETL_CD_NM, A.DETL_CD_NM) DETL_CD_NM /* 상세코드명 */ , a.DETL_CD_DSCR_CTN , A.COMN_DTLS_CD || ' - ' || nvl(B.DETL_CD_NM, A.DETL_CD_NM) AS "RTUR_VL" from CCCMCDDMT A /* 코드상세 */ , CCCMCDDLT B /* 언어별상세코드명 */ where A.COMN_GRP_CD = B.COMN_GRP_CD(+) and A.COMN_DTLS_CD = B.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) and ( ((#{srchCndtCtn} = '1') and ((A.APST_YMD <= sysdate) and (A.APFN_YMD >= sysdate))) or ((#{srchCndtCtn} = '2') and (A.COMN_DTLS_CD like #{comnDtlsCd} || '%')) ) and B.LNGG_CD(+) = #{lnggCd} and A.COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} order by A.SCRN_DSPL_SQNC, A.COMN_DTLS_CD

select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-listComnCdItemVl */ a.COMN_DTLS_CD , a.COMN_GRP_CD , a.COMN_ITEM_CD , a.COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL , b.DETL_CD_NM from CCCMCDIDT a ,CCCMCDDMT b where a.comn_grp_cd = #{comnGrpCd} and a.comn_item_cd = #{comnItemCd} and nvl(a.COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL, '*') = nvl(#{comnItemChrcVl}, '*') and a.COMN_GRP_CD = b.COMN_GRP_CD and a.COMN_DTLS_CD = b.COMN_DTLS_CD
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-selectOneDBTime */ select to_char(sysdate, #{dateFormat}) as dbtime from dual

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-selectOneComnGrpCdNorn */
select /*+ ccd_comcode_s02$S01_그룹코드 채번 요청 */ nvl(min(ta.NORN_SNO), 'NONE') as RTUR_VL from ( select #{comnGrpCd} || lpad(NORN_SNO, 3, '0') as NORN_SNO from CCDUMMYMT where NORN_SNO < 1000 and NORN_SNO > 0 minus select COMN_GRP_CD as NORN_SNO from CCCMCDMMT where COMN_GRP_CD like #{comnGrpCd} || '%' ) ta

select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-selectOneComCode */ COMN_GRP_CD , COMN_DTLS_CD , DETL_CD_NM , COMN_DTLS_CD , DETL_CD_NM , DETL_CD_DSCR_CTN , APST_YMD , APFN_YMD , SCRN_DSPL_SQNC from CCCMCDDMT where COMN_GRP_CD =#{comnGrpCd} and COMN_DTLS_CD =#{comnDtlsCd} and sysdate between APST_YMD and APFN_YMD + 0.99999 and rownum = 1

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-selectOneCccmCdidtCount */ select decode ( count ( 1 ) , 0 , 'N' , 'Y' ) as en /* 존재여부 */ from cccmcdimt imt /* 공통코드추가항목_T */ , cccmcdidt idt /* 공통코드추가항목값_T */ where imt.comn_grp_cd = #{comnGrpCd} /* 공통그룹코드 */ and imt.comn_item_cd = #{comnItemCd} /* 공통항목코드 */ and trunc ( imt.apst_ymd ) <= trunc ( sysdate ) and trunc ( imt.apfn_ymd ) > trunc ( sysdate ) and idt.comn_grp_cd = imt.comn_grp_cd and idt.comn_item_cd = imt.comn_item_cd and idt.comn_item_chrc_vl is not null
select /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-selectOneComcdValdCheck */ 'Y' as EN from CCCMCDDMT where COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} and COMN_DTLS_CD = #{comnDtlsCd}
mapper.insert: /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-insertComnCdItem */ INSERT /*+ ccd_comcode_i05$I01_사용자명_코드항목 등록 */ INTO CCCMCDIMT /* 공통코드추가항목_T */ ( COMN_GRP_CD /* 공통그룹코드 */ , COMN_ITEM_CD /* 공통항목코드 */ , COMN_ITEM_NM /* 공통항목명 */ , ITEM_DSCR_CTN /* 항목설명내용 */ , COMN_ITEM_TYP_CD /* 공통항목타입코드 */ , APST_YMD /* 적용시작일자 */ , APFN_YMD /* 적용종료일자 */ , FRST_RGSR_ID , FRST_RGST_IP , FRST_RGST_DT , FRST_RGST_CLNT_PRGM_ID , FRST_RGST_SRVR_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDR_ID , LAST_UPDT_IP , LAST_UPDT_DT , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID ) VALUES ( #{comnGrpCd} /* 공통그룹코드 */ , #{comnItemCd} /* 공통항목코드 */ , #{comnItemNm} /* 공통항목명 */ , #{itemDscrCtn} /* 항목설명내용 */ , #{afiInptTypNm} /* 공통항목타입코드 */ , to_date(#{apstYmd}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* 적용시작일자 */ , to_date(#{apfnYmd}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* 적용종료일자 */ , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} , #{gvUserId} , #{gvUserIp} , sysdate , #{gvClntPrgmId} , #{gvSrvrPrgmId} )
mapper.update: /*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-updateComnGrpCd */ UPDATE /*+ ccd_comcode_u08$I01_그룹코드 변경 */ CCCMCDMMT /* 공통코드_T */ SET GRP_CD_NM = #{grpCdNm} /* 그룹코드명 */ , GRP_CD_DSCR_CTN = #{grpCdDscrCtn} /* 그룹코드설명내용 */ , HGRN_GRP_CD = #{hgrnGrpCd} /* 상위그룹코드 */ , APST_YMD = to_date(#{apstYmd}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* 적용시작일자 */ , APFN_YMD = to_date(#{apfnYmd}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* 적용종료일자 */ , TYPE_CD = #{typeCd} /* 유형코드 */ , LIST_CD_TABL_NM = #{listCdTablNm} /* 목록코드테이블명 */ , ASIG_SYST_ID = #{asigSystId} /* 담당시스템ID */ , CNIX_ASGN_ID = #{cnixAsgnId} /* CI담당자ID */ , ACWR_ASGN_ID = #{acwrAsgnId} /* 현업담당자ID */ , RPRS_ENSN_TABL_NM = #{rprsEnsnTablNm} , RPRS_ENSN_CLMN_NM = #{rprsEnsnClmnNm} , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} /* 최종수정자ID */ , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} /* 최종수정IP */ , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate /* 최종수정일시 */ , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} WHERE COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd}

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-updateComnGrpCdMltiLngg */ UPDATE /*+ ccd_comcode_u02$I01_사용자명_언어별코드명 수정 */ CCCMCDMLT /* 공통코드언어별코드_T */ SET GRP_CD_NM = #{grpCdNm} /* 그룹코드명 */ , GRP_CD_DSCR_CTN = #{grpCdDscrCtn} /* 그룹코드설명내용 */ , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} /* 최종수정자ID */ , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} /* 최종수정IP */ , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate /* 최종수정일시 */ , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} WHERE COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} /* 공통그룹코드 */ AND LNGG_CD = #{lnggCd} /* 언어코드 */

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-updateComnDetlCd */ UPDATE /*+ ccd_comcode_u03$I01_사용자명_코드상세 수정 */ CCCMCDDMT /* 공통코드값_T */ SET DETL_CD_NM = #{detlCdNm} /* 상세코드명 */ , DETL_CD_DSCR_CTN = #{detlCdDscrCtn} /* 상세코드설명내용 */ , APST_YMD = to_date(#{apstYmd}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* 적용시작일자 */ , APFN_YMD = to_date(#{apfnYmd}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* 적용종료일자 */ , SCRN_DSPL_SQNC = #{scrnDsplSqnc} /* 화면표시순서 */ , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} /* 최종수정자ID */ , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} /* 최종수정IP */ , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate /* 최종수정일시 */ , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} WHERE COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} /* 공통그룹코드 */ AND COMN_DTLS_CD = #{comnDtlsCd} /* 공통세부코드 */

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-updateComnCdItemVl */ UPDATE /*+ ccd_comcode_u09$I01_코드항목 값 변경 */ CCCMCDIDT /* 공통코드추가항목값_T */ SET COMN_ITEM_CHRC_VL = #{comnItemChrcVl} /* 공통항목문자값 */ , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} /* 최종수정자ID */ , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} /* 최종수정IP */ , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate /* 최종수정일시 */ , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} WHERE COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} /* 공통그룹코드 */ AND COMN_DTLS_CD = #{comnDtlsCd} /* 공통세부코드 */ AND COMN_ITEM_CD = #{comnItemCd} /* 공통항목코드 */

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-updateComnDetlCdMltiLngg */ UPDATE /*+ ccd_comcode_u05$I01_사용자명_다국어 수정 */ CCCMCDDLT /* 공통코드언어별코드값_T */ SET DETL_CD_NM = #{detlCdNm} /* 상세코드명 */ , DETL_CD_DSCR_CTN = #{detlCdDscrCtn} /* 상세코드설명내용 */ , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} /* 최종수정자ID */ , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} /* 최종수정IP */ , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate /* 최종수정일시 */ , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} WHERE COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} /* 공통그룹코드 */ AND COMN_DTLS_CD = #{comnDtlsCd} /* 공통세부코드 */ AND LNGG_CD = #{lnggCd} /* 언어코드 */

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-updateComnCdItem */
UPDATE /*+ ccd_comcode_u07$I01_사용자명_코드항목 수정 */ CCCMCDIMT /* 코드항목 */ SET COMN_ITEM_NM = #{comnItemNm} /* 공통항목명 */ , COMN_ITEM_TYP_CD = #{afiInptTypNm} /* 공통항목타입코드 */ , ITEM_DSCR_CTN = #{itemDscrCtn} /* 항목설명내용 */ , APST_YMD = to_date(#{apstYmd}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* 적용시작일자 */ , APFN_YMD = to_date(#{apfnYmd}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') /* 적용종료일자 */ , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} /* 최종수정자ID */ , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} /* 최종수정IP */ , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate /* 최종수정일시 */ , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} WHERE COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} /* 공통그룹코드 */ AND COMN_ITEM_CD = #{comnItemCd} /* 공통항목코드 */
mapper.delete:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-deleteComnGrpCdMltiLngg */
DELETE /*+ ccd_comcode_d02$I01_사용자명_그룹코드 다국어 삭제 */ FROM CCCMCDMLT /* 공통코드언어별코드_T */ WHERE COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} /* 공통그룹코드 */ AND ( ( #{srchCndtCtn} = '1' ) or ( /* srchCndtCtn : 2 : [ CCC001F2 : 그룹코드등록 : 행삭제 기능 사용 ] */ ( #{srchCndtCtn} = '2' ) and ( LNGG_CD = #{lnggCd} ) ) )

/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-deleteComnCdItem */ UPDATE /*+ ccd_comcode_d03$I01_사용자명_코드항목 삭제 */ CCCMCDIMT /* 공통코드추가항목_T */ SET APFN_YMD = sysdate , LAST_UPDR_ID = #{gvUserId} /* 최종수정자ID */ , LAST_UPDT_IP = #{gvUserIp} /* 최종수정IP */ , LAST_UPDT_DT = sysdate /* 최종수정일시 */ , LAST_UPDT_CLNT_PRGM_ID = #{gvClntPrgmId} , LAST_UPDT_SRVR_PRGM_ID = #{gvSrvrPrgmId} WHERE COMN_GRP_CD = #{comnGrpCd} /* 공통그룹코드 */ AND ( ( #{srchCndtCtn} = '1' ) or /* srchCndtCtn : 4로 보내는 화면은 [ CCC003F1 : 삭제처리 ]에서 보낸다. */ ( ( #{srchCndtCtn} in ( '2', '4' ) ) and ( COMN_ITEM_CD = #{comnItemCd} ) ) ) /* 2019-08-01 : Delete에서 Update로 변경처리 함. delete from CCCMCDIMT where COMN_GRP_CD = :comnGrpCd and ( (:srchCndtCtn = '1') or ((:srchCndtCtn in ('2', '4')) and (COMN_ITEM_CD = :comnItemCd)) ) */
mapper.select:
/*SQL_ID: com-sds-healthcare-ehr-com-cc-ccc-dao-CccComcodeDAO-selectOneTotalComCodeCount */
select COUNT(A.COMN_DTLS_CD) as TOTAL_DATA_COUNT from CCCMCDDMT A /* 코드상세 */ , CCCMCDDLT B /* 언어별상세코드명 */ where A.COMN_GRP_CD = B.COMN_GRP_CD(+) and A.COMN_DTLS_CD = B.COMN_DTLS_CD(+) and A.APST_YMD <= sysdate and A.APFN_YMD >= sysdate and B.LNGG_CD(+) = nvl(#{lnggCd}, #{lnggCd})
